name: FallenAngelSaga
description:
This game was created for  RetroGrade Jam 2 ( https://itch.io/jam/retrograde-jam2 )

It's a simple SRPG with a retro NES-like atmosphere.

In the GameJam version, there are 3 stages in total.

*** There is a bug that if you take focus off the game while playing in the browser, the space key will behave as it does in the browser. If you download and play via the itch.io app, this problem will not occur, so we recommend playing that way.

Controls: 

  [UP/LEFT/RIGHT/DOWN key] : Move cursor, select

  Space : Select unit, decide command.

  C : Cancel unit selection

Game Rules: 

  This is a simple Grid-based Tactics RPG.

  If the protagonist dies, the game is over.

  Units with higher ATK are treated as physical attacks, while units with higher MGC are treated as magical attacks.

  A sorcerer has a range of 1-2.

  The archer has a range of 2.

  All other units have a range of 1.

  Attacks from outside range cannot be counterattacked.

  Units on wood or stone squares have a bonus to evade.

  All allied units on top of a house square will recover 10 HP every turn.

  When you accumulate 100 experience, you will level up and have random growth based on the unit's growth rate.
